Questions.Ideas: How can I propose an idea for a tool or module?
Questions.Errors: I found an error or annoying behavior.

Answers.HowMuch: Nothing, I intend to keep baulchino free of cost, my plan is to keep every feature free of cost, including the ones in the future and proposed ones as long as it is feasible.
Answers.Why: I enjoyed my time learning mandarin, but I did find a lot of resources somewhat scatter and wish for a website that had a range of tools in one place just to take them for quick reference.
Answers.Ideas: You can suggest your ideas via the media icons at the bottom of the page, choose your favorite and click it to reach me out
Answers.Errors: Please send me a message via the media icons at the bottom of the page, choose your favorite and click it to reach me out, please describe the error so I can fix it. I might reply later, but I do read all messages. Thank you.

Metadata.Title: Mandarin Chinese Learning Channels | Free Resources

Metadata.Title: Chinese Writing | Animated Stroke Order & Radicals
Metadata.Description: Learn to write Chinese characters properly with interactive animated guides. Master stroke order and radicals through personalized exercises.

Hanzi.HeroMessage1: Learn to write Chinese characters accurately using our interactive animated guides. Master proper stroke order and understand radical composition.
Hanzi.HeroMessage2: Try it now: Type any character in the text box to see its animation.

Metadata.Title: HSK Audio Files | HSK Texbook and Workbook Audios
Metadata.Description: Listen to HSK audio files from each unit in the HSK textbooks and workbooks. Perfect for audio practice and language learning.

HskAudios.HeroMessage1: Hi, here you can find all audio files from the HSK textbooks and workbooks units. This page aims to help you find the audios for each unit and allow you to practice or do the corresponding exercise. You can download the audio by pressing the ‚¨áÔ∏è button
HskAudios.HeroMessage2: If you find that an audio is wrong or missing you can notify me via the surveys on this website or an email at wichosubuilds@gmail.com. Thank you
HskAudios.DownloadButton: Download book audio in a single zip file

Metadata.Title: Download HSK Audio Files | Complete Audio Packs
Metadata.Description: Download complete HSK audio file collections as ZIP files. All textbook and workbook audios organized by HSK level for offline practice.

HskAudiosDownload.HeroMessage: Download complete audio packs for each HSK level. Each ZIP file contains all audio tracks from the textbooks and workbooks, organized for easy offline access and practice.
HskAudiosDownload.SectionTitle: Download all audios from a HSK book

Metadata.Title: HSK Mock Test Online | HSK Mock Test Download
Metadata.Description: Try an online HSK mock test or download it for in-person practice for free.

HskMockTest.HeroMessage1: This page aims to help you get an idea of what an HSK test might be. Pick the HSK level and test you desire, and it will open an interactive digital version of the test. You will be given the results and score when submitting.
HskMockTest.HeroMessage2: The mock test files were gathered from public resources; some of them are the real exams used back in 2013. If you have a mock test you want to share, please contact me through X.
HskMockTest.DownloadBundles: Download HSK mock test bundle (exam, answers, audio file)

Hero.title: HSK Online Simulator Demo
Hero.message: This page aims to help you get an idea of what an HSK test might be.
Hero.message2: Disclaimer: This is a demo, not the real test. It is incomplete and will be updated gradually with more questions and features for every HSK level
Hero.message3: Please send feedback to wichosubuilds@gmail.com or any of the media icons at the bottom of the page. I will also add a survey to the page to gather feedback soon.
Hero.error: An error has occurred while loading the description. If the test is not showing please refresh the page or try again later.

Metadata.Title: About Baulchino and it's maintainer
Metadata.Description: Brief explanation of why Baulchino exists and what the maintainer Wichosu aims to do with it.

About.Title: About me and this website
About.Subtitle: Who am I?
About.Paragraph1: Hi! If you've ever wondered who's behind this website let me introduce myself. I'm Luis (aka Wichosu), a software developer and between 2023 and 2024 I studied Mandarin Chinese in a local language school in my hometown.
About.Paragraph2: That experience motivated me to build software to help people learn Mandarin. Inspired by other creators and websites, I came up with the idea for Baulchino in January 2025. Over time, I‚Äôve added more features, and it has become a project in constant evolution.
About.Paragraph3: If you are building any software and need advice or want to share your experience, feel free to contact me, I don't charge for advice or anything.

Metadata.Title: Future plans for Baulchino
Metadata.Description: Future plans for Baulchino, you can suggest your ideas via email or any of the media icons at the bottom of the page.

Roadmap.Title: Baulchino Roadmap
Roadmap.Paragraph: Here you can find what I'm currently working on and some future plans.

Card1.Title: HSK Mock Test Simulator
Card1.Paragraph1: A mock test simulator for the HSK (HSK 1-6) exams. It allows you to practice the HSK exams and get a feel for the format and difficulty of the exams.
Card1.Paragraph2: I already made some progress with this feature, but I do find it challenging to implement, you can check out my progress in the HSK Mock Test page of this site.

Card2.Title: HSK Workbook and Textbook answers
Card2.Paragraph1: I got a request to submit an answer sheet with all answers from the HSK books. I think it's a good idea and so far only release the PDF file with answers to HSK 1 workbook.
Card2.Paragraph2: Although I'm interested in eventually making a PDF with answers for every book in the HSK series.

Card3.Title: Phonetic Table
Card3.Paragraph1: One of the most requested features and one of my most excited to work on.
Card3.Paragraph2: The phonetic table will be split in two, first maybe buttons with only vowels and their tones, and then the table with all consonants and their tones.

Metadata.Title: Support Baulchino
Metadata.Description: Support Baulchino, you can suggest your ideas via email or any of the media icons at the bottom of the page.

Support.Title: Support the project
Support.Paragraph1: If you‚Äôd like to support the project, you can do so by donating on Ko-fi or contributing to the project on GitHub. There‚Äôs absolutely no obligation ‚Äî Baulchino will remain available regardless ‚Äî but any support is truly appreciated and helps keep the project growing.
Support.Paragraph2: The emails and comments I receive have been a great source of motivation, and I‚Äôm sincerely grateful for all of you. Knowing that Baulchino is helping you work toward your goals means more to me than anything else. Thank you for visiting and using Baulchino.
Support.Paragraph3: By donating any amount you will be added to the list of supporters downbelow.
Support.Paragraph4: Many thanks to the supporters of Baulchino
